record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - July 22, 2008)

[Page: S7087]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:31 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, July 23, 2008, at 10 a.m.
